topics.body:
So apparently the LHC discovered particles that have four quarks in it.


Also Boeing has patented a jet engine that uses fission. . . Before you freak out you would have to put your mouth over the exhaust in order to get irradiated like how dogs try to put their mouths over houses. . . and if you're putting your mouth directly at the exhaust of a jet engine you have a lot more to worry about than radiation; namely third degree burns.




And in something I don't like Kuwait has become the first country with mandatory dna tests for all citizens.
